import React from 'react'; import {httpService} from '../../service/HttpService'; import {config} from '../../config/Config'; import { Loading } from '../layout/Loading'; class Warga extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { wargas:[], submitted:false, warga:{ NIK:'', nama_lengkap:'', nama_panggilan:'', tempat_tinggal:'', tempat_lahir:'', tanggal_lahir:'', jenis_kelamin:'', alamat:'', RT:'', RW:'', kecamatan:'', agama:'', status:'', pekerjaan:'', kewarganegaraan:'', foto:'', foto_ktp:'' } }; this.addWarga = this.addWarga.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } componentWillMount() { Loading.SpinnerRun(true); httpService.Get(config.routeApi.wargas,null).then(response=>{ this.setState({ wargas:response }, function() { Loading.SpinnerRun(false); }); }); } addWarga(){ window.$('#form-warga-modal').modal('show'); } handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); Loading.SpinnerRun(true); httpService.Post(config.routeApi.wargaSave,null).then(response => { window.$('#form-warga-modal').modal('hide'); }); } handleChange(event) { const target = event.target; const value = target.type === 'checkbox' ? target.checked : target.value; const name = target.name; let _warga = Object.assign({}, this.state.warga); _warga[name] = value; this.setState({warga:_warga}); // this.validationSubmit(); } render(){ return
